name: Sisyphus Muddled Along
description:
Game Overview: 

Sisyphus Muddled Alone is a third-person game where the player controls a 2d character in the 3d scene. Player needs to control the character to push a rock to achieve the End. There are various obstacles on the road. Players need to push the ball to avoid them. Of course, there are also lovely gods as your check point. Have fun in Sisyphus Muddled Along!

.Control:

WASD or Joy-Stick to Move.

J or 〇 (on controller)  to Dash.

Creators:

Gavin Guan(Game Programmer, UI Design, Audio)

Siddarth Vimala Ravindren:(Game Design,  Art)

Shichen(Luke) Qian:(Game Design, Environment Design)
